This is my story

  My name is Cristina Pop and I've made my first steps into the world of web development as a freelancer. My story begins two years ago when I have discovered my passion for programming.

  If you are a businessman, an entrepreneur, a talented person or whatever your occupation is and you need a website for your business or you know someone who needs one, than I am the key to your project.

You can find me on this email address: 'contact.devcdp@gmail.com' or you can check the contact section and leave a message.
